The ''care pathway'' consists of organising and coordinating the right sequence of professional skills at the right time throughout a patient's care.

question.question: What is the primary focus of the 'care pathway' in clinical practice?
question.option_a: Ensuring that patients receive the correct medication at the right time
question.option_b: Organising and coordinating the right sequence of professional skills at the right time throughout a patient's care
question.option_c: Managing the administrative tasks related to patient billing and insurance
question.option_d: Providing emotional support to patients and their families during treatment
